html:
1.27.19  10:42 pm   what is your opinion on dragonflies

     they don't make them like they used to

1.27.19  10:28 pm   Can we hear the raw vocal harmony on "it's going around the world" from Airport Terminal?

     i wish, but i am afraid it might fall into the wrong hands

1.27.19  9:46 pm   What color is best

     they are all equally bad

1.27.19  8:16 pm   so your new (or maybe it's old by now) strategy has been to write brand new songs? because it ultimately it gets content out faster? correct me if I'm wrong, ect.

     not necessarily faster, but perhaps fresher

1.27.19  8:14 pm   what goes on in your head when you're coming up with video ideas?

     the idea itself

1.27.19  8:11 pm   why isn't "flipping thru my rug" on your site?

     it was just a vine test. but it should be on the site. i would like to have a vine page that can play all the vine versions of videos, looped properly. this is kind of a technical challenge i still haven't solved, because i want them to loop reliably with the proper timing. for the one you mentioned, the loop doesn't really matter, but it is part of the vine project which i haven't figured out yet

1.27.19  8:04 pm   do you ever drive somewhere and get the best idea while you're in the car,

     absolutely

      but you can"t write it down because you're driving?

     no, i am well equipped to document ideas while driving.

      or is that just me?

1.27.19  6:55 pm   how do you feel about being alive in this time period ?

     pretty good

1.27.19  6:28 pm   hey bill, i have wanted to start recording a lot of the ideas i have been having and just producing them in general, however, i am hesitant because i feel as though my voice is rather... terrible, and i dont have a very high upper register, what should i do?

     sounds like you're gonna have to be a bit more creative with the tools you do have. this can be fun and exciting actually, and a lot of very exciting scenes in movies are when people are being creative using the tools they have, to get results you might not have thought they could

1.27.19  3:41 pm   Why don't you capitalize your name or the letter 'i' when you refer to yourself?

     not capitalizing i is explained here, and the reason i don't capitalize my channel / site / social media names (bill wurtz) is to look a little more like a person and less like a governmental institution

      Does it have anything to do with e.e cummings? 

     no

1.27.19  3:13 pm   what sort of content you thinking about doin?

     mixed, non-mixed, and a mix of mixed and non-mixed

1.27.19  2:45 pm   what would your advice be to someone who is beginning to take their 'hobby' seriously in the age of a self-promotion, internet economy? what if the particular subject isn't as quickly producible as music (relatively speaking)?

     i can't really give any specific advice unless you tell me what that hobby is, but if you want to take it seriously, make sure you are doing a quick daily agenda list at the beginning of the day with your daily goals, and also do a quick evaluation of the previous day, and assess how you think you did yesterday

1.27.19  2:13 pm   what is the difference between a duck?

     1 leg's the same

1.27.19  1:10 pm   Are you gonna have merch sometime soon?

     i already do but i may cancel it sometime soon

1.27.19  1:02 pm   what makes our consciousness individual when we are all made out of the same kinds of atoms?

     the patterns and configurations they can make

1.27.19  12:58 pm   do you focus more on the melody or lyrics when you listen to songs

     whichever the song focuses more on

1.27.19  12:48 pm   Why are the numbers 240 on your wall

     because i switched the 2 and the 4

1.27.19  12:46 pm   Do you own a keytar?

     no

1.27.19  12:45 pm   why smile when the world is going to die

     because it is currently alive

1.27.19  12:02 pm   Do you think ducks have superpowers?

     yes

1.27.19  12:00 pm   Hey Mr. Wurtz, did you know that Karl Marx is believed to be the founder of modern communism, and his theories have also been referred to as Marxism???

     yes

1.27.19  11:58 am   Will you ever go on tour??

     yes

1.27.19  11:54 am   if you ever do a live tour, will you come to my country (turkey)?

     i will try

     and anither question, what do you think of Bob Ross?

     he is nice

     or are you the reincarnation of him?

     no

1.27.19  11:35 am   What day of the week is it?

     sunday, but that's rapidly changing

1.27.19  9:10 am   how important is good relative pitch for making music?

     very, extremely

      I'm using ear training apps but I've hit a wall at around 60-70% right at guessing intervals.

1.27.19  8:33 am   hey, same person from 1.26.19  7:59 am , how do i then figure out what key that main melody is then when the notes fit both Dmaj and Amaj scales? And even that mixolydian thing you mentioned? 

      whatever it feels like. if you can't tell, then it would be one of those ambiguous cases

1.27.19  7:13 am   i long so badly to be in an sea full of people all singing all your songs as you perform them. because ive only ever sang your songs alone but i know there are so many other people like me. please please promise that this will happen

     i will see what i can do

1.27.19  6:05 am   I like your "history of the whole world i guess" video. I like how it is so much engaging and in approximately 20 minutes, you have said most of the important events of the world. Do you feel like you have the time to make videos like that with such information so dense on, for example, individual countries or on a different topic?

     it depends if that is the only thing i ever want to do for the rest of my life

1.27.19  4:03 am   You said that in 2011 you tried to make more "normal" songs but what did you actually mean by normal

     songs that have things like a verse and chorus, maybe even a song where the chorus was written first but doesn't occur first. prior to that, my only songwriting method was to just start at the beginning and just go bananas, from one moment to the next, never knowing what's gonna happen until you get there

1.27.19  3:41 am   what's something that you like about yourself?

     ability to say things

1.27.19  1:41 am   How do you manage stress

     stir gently

1.27.19  1:32 am   What is expert mode?

     i'm not entirely sure

1.27.19  1:09 am   How/Why do you think the human species will end?

     some kind of level up, i suppose

1.27.19  12:29 am   Why do I get bored despite the amazingness of existence?

      your tolerance has increased, and you need a higher and higher dosage to get your fix of amazement

1.27.19  12:27 am   Ive read the questions asking about you doing live performances and i started to wonder... Do your videos give you enough knowledge to do Stand-Up comedy?

     not entirely

      And another question, will you post these performances (if you do any) on your YouTube Channel and ect. as like different content and a reminder that you do other stuff too? Hopefully you get what im asking.

     it depends what the performances are, and if they are any good or can be made good

1.27.19  12:14 am   #jo ;) You are cool, humourous and seems like so free!! How can you be like this and that !?

     anyone who spends enough time valuing those principles will eventually come to embody them

1.26.19  11:35 pm   how Do I hold the bass right

     i'm not sure

1.26.19  11:13 pm   How would you describe the color orange to a blind person

     tangy

1.26.19  10:26 pm   this is just random but is clicking 12 times per second with 1 finger fast or not

     yes

1.26.19  10:17 pm   how do you make melodies so easily?

     it helps to sing them. that is what melodies like best

1.26.19  9:36 pm   are you trying to make progress with getting permissions to do a youtube music video for a cover?

     thousands of covers, preferably

1.26.19  9:10 pm   Bit of a rant, I'm looking for any advice. I'm in high school and I've been having a really bad year. My grades are great and I have plenty of friends, but I feel terrible. My life is pretty good, but... I don't really have hobbies or personal projects that I do. It makes me feel super unaccomplished.

All I'm acheiving are some numbers in a grade book for some distant promise that I can use them to get a decent job. That's it, that's my life. I study and I get good grades. It frustrates me to no end. I want something unique to me! I'm not going to be in high school forever, and I want something to carry with me to college and beyond.

What I'm asking is if you have struggled with similar things, and how you overcame them. Or if you haven't, since you seem to have been passionate about music from day 1, how can I start working on me? It's a big big world and I don't even know where to start!

     i'm not sure, i had the opposite problem. i had all the inspiration but i had to go sit around in a boring building for many hours each day

1.26.19  7:33 pm   What went through your head while making ball and stick?

     'what should the next part be', 'is what i have so far any good', 'here's an idea for the next part,' etc

1.26.19  6:58 pm   I want to make music. What should i need to learn first?

     what tools are available to you, and which ones you like

1.26.19  6:12 pm   hi mr. bill wurtz, can you recommend me any resources on music theory? i love your jazzy snazzy style, cool thank you

     whatever music you like

1.26.19  5:40 pm   why were you shy when you were being interviewed in H3 podcast

     because it was being broadcast live to an invisible audience of many thousands, which unfortunately i was not accustomed to quite yet, at the time

1.26.19  4:37 pm   1.25.19  11:25 am does this mean no day is opposite day

     it's opposite world

1.26.19  4:03 pm   Is there a way to develop a sense of rhythm if you don't feel it naturally? Like, can a person who can't keep a beat learn to do it?

     i don't know

1.26.19  3:53 pm   what song genre you like the most?

     the only thing that is going to satisfy me is switching it

1.26.19  2:56 pm   What do you think about this progression: Fm Cmaj7 A#maj7

     most of the context is missing, also you'd most surely want to call it Bbmaj7 not A#maj7
